# Clean Cut Painting & Handyman
> Professional painting and handyman services in Decatur and Springfield, Illinois since 2016.

## Business Overview
Clean Cut Painting & Handyman is a woman-owned, professional painting and handyman company serving residential and commercial customers across Central Illinois. Founded in 2016, they operate from two offices in Decatur and Springfield, covering a 60-mile service radius throughout the region.

## Contact Information
- **Website:** https://www.cleancutservice.com
- **Email:** info@cleancutservice.com
- **Phone (Decatur):** (217) 330-7310
- **Phone (Springfield):** (217) 672-5654

## Locations

### Decatur Office (Headquarters)
- 1004 E Eldorado St, Decatur, IL 62521
- Phone: (217) 330-7310

### Springfield Office
- 631 E Princeton Ave, Unit D, Springfield, IL 62703
- Phone: (217) 672-5654

## Hours of Operation
- Monday - Friday: 7:30 AM - 4:30 PM
- Saturday: 8:00 AM - 1:00 PM
- Sunday: Closed

## Services

### Residential Services
- **Interior Painting:** https://www.cleancutservice.com/residential/interior-painting/
- **Exterior Painting:** https://www.cleancutservice.com/residential/exterior-painting/
- **Cabinet Refinishing:** https://www.cleancutservice.com/residential/cabinet-refinishing/
- **Deck Staining & Restoration:** https://www.cleancutservice.com/residential/deck-staining/
- **Power Washing:** https://www.cleancutservice.com/residential/power-washing/
- **Handyman Services:** https://www.cleancutservice.com/residential/handyman/

### Commercial Services
- **Commercial Painting & Maintenance:** https://www.cleancutservice.com/commercial/

## Service Areas
Central Illinois including Decatur, Springfield, Champaign-Urbana, Mount Zion, Forsyth, Chatham, Auburn, Riverton, Rochester, Taylorville, Lincoln, Mattoon, Bloomington-Normal, and surrounding communities within a 60-mile radius.

## Reviews & Reputation
- **Google Rating:** 4.7 stars from 300+ reviews
- **BBB Accredited** since 2019

## About the Owner
Dara Mossman founded Clean Cut Painting & Handyman in 2016. The company is woman-owned and committed to craftsmanship, collaboration, and community in Central Illinois.
